text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 7 Drugs that affect the Immune System Chapters 49, 50, & 51 1. Discuss the actions, uses, adverse reactions, contraindications, precautions, and interactions of drugs that affect the immune system. 2. Implement important pre-administration and ongoing focused assessment activities the nurse should perform on a patient taking a drug that affects the immune system. 3. Use the nursing process to implement care for a patient receiving a drug that affects the immune system. 4. Identify important points to keep in mind when educating patients and families about the use of the drugs covered in this module.
